Label: Nicotinic acid adenine dinucleotide (NaAD+)
Comment: Assuming that NAADP+ is referred to (since the phosphate group is needed for stabilisation).

Label: NR
Comment: N-ribosylnicotinamide = NR</br>occurs extracellularly in blood and milk and can be provided in the diet

Label: L-kynurenine
Comment: most abundant kynurenines found in caput epididymal tissue

Label: Nicotinic acid (NA)
Comment: Provided by diet and, potentially, by bacterial degradative pathways in vertebrates

Label: Kynurenic acid (KA)
Comment: most abundant kynurenines found in caput epididymal tissue

Label: KAT
Comment: kynurenine aminotransferase ( KAT ; also known as AADAT)

Label: K3H
Comment: kynurenine 3-hydroxylase ( K3H ; also known as KMO)
